Name: KittenMouse: Summer Of Love
About the game: It's the Summer of 2020, and the town is ablaze with fiery Riots! One man fights for justice, against the Mob. A first person shooter, with multiple weapon types! A single player campaign with 5 Action Packed Levels! A thrilling story of one mans fight to safeguard his community! You play as KittenMouse, as he protects his home, his town, and his local car dealership, during the fiery 'Summer Of Love' 2020!
